pkmkdoc.description: This package will install the compiler libraries necessary to run the MOOSE framework. This package also contains commonly used applications associated with the building and testing of the MOOSE related framework. (Use custom install to select additional packages)

choice.title: Payload_File
choice.description: This the main payload tarball containing the binary files.

choice.title: MOOSE Compilers
choice.description: This is the main compiler stack. Everyone should check this option.

choice.title: MOOSE Environment
choice.description: This package will modify your ~/.bash_profile to source additional MOOSE environment profiles necessary for MOOSE development. You should always have this option checked, unless you really know what you are doing!

choice.title: Icecream
choice.description: This package will configure your machine to utilize the Icecream network. By selecting this package, you are instructing the installer to enable a cronjob in the root environment which will maintain a clean connection to the Icecream scheduler. This is only usable whilst on the INL network.

choice.title: cleanup_post
choice.description: Script to clean up temp install directory.

choice.title: LLDB non-root
choice.description:
Allow any user to run LLDB with out the need to supply sudo credentials each time.
Selecting this option will install a self-signed root trusted certificate into the system Keychain for this purpose.

pkmkdoc.requirements: <requirement id="tosv" operator="ge" value="''">This package was designed to be installed on Mac OS X
